statements: SELECT * FROM supplier_performance
SELECT supplier_name, delivery_quality_rating FROM supplier_performance
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, lead_time_days FROM supplier_performance WHERE lead_time_days > 5
SELECT supplier_name FROM supplier_performance WHERE delivery_quality_rating >= 4.0
SELECT * FROM supplier_performance ORDER BY lead_time_days DESC
SELECT supplier_name, delivery_quality_rating FROM supplier_performance WHERE supplier_id = 1
SELECT * FROM supplier_performance WHERE lead_time_days > 5 ORDER BY supplier_name ASC
SELECT supplier_name, lead_time_days FROM supplier_performance WHERE delivery_quality_rating <= 4.5
SELECT * FROM supplier_performance WHERE delivery_quality_rating BETWEEN 4.0 AND 4.5
SELECT AVG(delivery_quality_rating) AS avg_quality_rating FROM supplier_performance
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, lead_time FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name FROM suppliers WHERE lead_time < 5;
SELECT supplier_name, delivery_score, quality_score FROM supplier_performance ORDER BY delivery_score DESC, quality_score ASC;
SELECT * FROM supplier_performance WHERE supplier_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, lead_time FROM suppliers WHERE lead_time > 5;
SELECT sp.supplier_id, sp.delivery_score, sp.quality_score, s.supplier_name FROM supplier_performance sp JOIN suppliers s ON sp.supplier_id = s.supplier_id;
SELECT supplier_name, SUM(lead_time) AS total_lead_time FROM suppliers GROUP BY supplier_name;
SELECT supplier_id, AVG(delivery_score) AS avg_delivery_score FROM supplier_performance GROUP BY supplier_id HAVING avg_delivery_score > 85;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_rating FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_rating > 3;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price < 50.00;

SELECT supplier_name, product_name, lead_time_days FROM suppliers INNER JOIN products ON suppliers.supplier_id = products.supplier_id INNER JOIN lead_times ON products.product_id = lead_times.product_id WHERE supplier_rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_rating > 3 ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_rating < 2;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM products WHERE product_price > 1000;
SELECT product_name, product_price, supplier_name FROM products JOIN suppliers ON products.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id;

SELECT supplier_name, AVG(lead_time_days) AS average_lead_time FROM suppliers JOIN products ON suppliers.supplier_id = products.supplier_id JOIN lead_times ON products.product_id = lead_times.product_id GROUP BY supplier_name HAVING average_lead_time < 5;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_rating FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_price > 100;
SELECT orders.order_id, products.product_name, orders.order_date FROM orders JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id;
SELECT * FROM suppliers
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price > 50 ORDER BY product_price DESC
SELECT orders.order_id, orders.quantity, products.product_name FROM orders JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id

SELECT suppliers.supplier_name, AVG(lead_times.lead_time) AS average_lead_time FROM suppliers JOIN lead_times ON suppliers.supplier_id = lead_times.supplier_id GROUP BY suppliers.supplier_id HAVING average_lead_time > 5
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_rating > 4.5;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price < 50.00 ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT purchase_date, purchase_quantity FROM purchases WHERE purchase_quantity >= 100 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, rating_value FROM suppliers JOIN ratings ON suppliers.supplier_id = ratings.supplier_id WHERE rating_value < 3.0 ORDER BY supplier_name;
SELECT * FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_rating > 4.5;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY product_price ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, purchase_date, purchase_quantity FROM suppliers s JOIN purchases p ON s.supplier_id = p.supplier_id;
SELECT supplier_name, rating_value FROM suppliers s JOIN ratings r ON s.supplier_id = r.supplier_id WHERE rating_value < 3.0;
